content:
Alternative Solutions for Chat Features That Aren’t Available in Messaging for In-App and Web

Planning to replace Chat with Messaging for In-App and Web, but don’t see a Chat feature available? Review this list of alternative solutions.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Messaging for In-App and Web is available in Lightning Experience. View required editions
Chat is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experiences. View required editions.
	 This article applies to: Messaging for In-App and Messaging for Web channels and Chat channels.
	 This article doesn’t apply to: Standard and enhanced WhatsApp, standard and enhanced Facebook Messenger, standard and enhanced SMS, enhanced Apple Messages for Business, and Bring Your Own Channel.

NOTE If your business has a use case for a feature that’s not yet available in Messaging for In-App and Web, we want to know. Work with your Account team to submit a Voice of the Customer request or submit the use case on Ideas Exchange.

CHAT FEATURE	MESSAGING FOR IN-APP AND WEB ALTERNATIVE SOLUTION
Queue Position	Estimated Wait Time
IP Blocking	Use a custom object and Omni-flow to check.
LWC	Messaging for In-App and Web supports Lightning Web Components in your pre-chat form. To customize anything else, use a messaging component and send it via an agent or a bot.

Did this article solve your issue? Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Alternative Solutions for Chat Features
